EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for visiting Pivotal at RedisConf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for visiting Pivotal’s booth at RedisConf 2017!
At Pivotal, we know that waiting for a Redis instance to be set-up can get in the way of developers doing they love most, creating amazing software! That’s why Pivotal Cloud Foundry offers a way for ops teams to provide a dedicated, pre-provisioned Redis service that works on any cloud — so that your developers can spend more time coding and less time thumb-twiddling.
In fact, the Pivotal Cloud Foundry Services Marketplace <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/services?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=redisconf-sf-q217]]> provides users with on-demand provisioning of add-on services that help you enhance, secure, and manage your applications, from data persistence, caching, messaging to continuous integration.
To learn about Pivotal’s on-demand services for Redis, please join our upcoming webinar: The Fastest Way to Redis on Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/service/player/en-US/theme/default/channel/14883/webcast/263407/play?showChannelList=false]]> on June 28, 2017 at 8:00AM PST.
During this webinar, we'll cover:
- Use cases and requirements for developers - Alternative ways to access and manage Redis in the cloud - Features and roadmap of Redis for Pivotal Cloud Foundry - Quick demo
Additionally, please take advantage of our library of resources, including these case studies showing how some of our customers are leveraging Pivotal Cloud Foundry to transform how they build software:
- Liberty Mutual: transformation to disrupt their industry - CIO James McGlennon discusses the risks and rewards, the wins and the failures, and everything in between with Pivotal’s Executive Chairman of the Board Paul Maritz. Listen <[[https://pivotal.io/liberty-mutual?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=redisconf-sf-q217]]> - Allstate journey to CI/CD and Test Driven Development - Matt Curry from Allstate, one of the largest US insurers, describes the company’s journey to Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment, and Test-driven development with the goal to drive automation all the way through the application lifecycle. Listen <[[http://thenewstack.io/allstates-devops-honeymoon-pivotal-going-strong-one-year-later/]]> - Volkswagen Digital Transformation Will Halve its IT Operations Costs: This article describes how Volkswagen is transforming from a car manufacturer to a Mobility Service Provider with an open cloud platform. Read <[[http://www.computerworlduk.com/cloud-computing/volkswagen-continues-open-source-cloud-push-with-cloud-foundry-paas-3646928/]]>
Enjoy!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
